title: NLNOG Presentation trilogy on technical jobs and careers
summary: Over the past eight years I’ve held a trilogy (in four parts) of presentations over at NLNOG covering the working life and career of technical people. This is around two hours of video and slides (with notes), but I’ve heard from people who binge-watched all of it in one go. The presentations have been online for ages, but you had to know where to look for them. On this page I bring them all together, with some context.
